quotes.text: Sometimes you don't do ANYTHING all day. And then you feel guilty but still do nothing. But we shouldn't feel guilty because those days just happen. You're allowed to do nothing sometimes, especially when you just don't feel up to anything else.
A ship in a harbour is safe, but that is not what ships are for.

Friends can help each other – A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself – and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to – letting a person be what he really is.

I believe that two people are connected at the heart, and it doesn't matter what you do, or who you are or where you live; there are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
Like a grand and miraculous spaceship, our planet has sailed through the universe of time. And for a brief moment, we have been among its many passengers.
So what if God, or fate, or nature, or random chance put your life on hard-mode. Beat the game anyway.

Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
The reason we struggle with insecurity is because we compare our behind-the-scenes to everyone else's highlight reel.

quoteData._comment: Unattributed quotes. If the source is found add them to their own object.

quotes.text: Worrying does not take away tomorrow's troubles. It takes away today's peace.
The feeling of being in your arms, even just for a second when you hug me is the best feeling in the world.
You say you love me and want to hold me tight. These words run through my head day and night. I dream of you holding me and making me see, that forever together we're meant to be.

imageData._comment: Unattributed images. Locate the source and add them to their own objects.
